website_summaries.verdict: A good value for 32 4-ounce tubs of popular flavors. Different textures introduce baby to new food consistencies.
pros: Nutritious, wholesome non-GMO recipes with no artificial colors
Variety makes it easy to alternate flavors
cons: Some parents wish the sets had more veggie tubs than fruit tubs
Reports of broken tubs and watery products

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Much more watered down that beechnut or sprouts. I purchased this pack for about $28. To be honest Wegmans sells the same packs individually for 1.59 per pack, total of a little over $25. This becomes a deal when you subscribe and save although I likely will not purchase this brand again after done.
customer_reviews.author: alice

customer_reviews.title: Good selection
customer_reviews.text: Nice selection of food but way to many apple ones. Wish there was more veggies.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Puree of green peas is not tasty, the child did not eat. The rest is mashed delicious
customer_reviews.author: Aleksandra

customer_reviews.title: Stains!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased these years ago with my first, and now my #2 is ready for them. Our white highchair tray (same from 1st kid) was immediately stained, including 2 of my baby spoons. Not sure what's different about the formulation - but I never experienced this 3 years ago. I've since changed brands.
customer_reviews.author: Kyla

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My baby girl hates the carrots but loves the rest.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: My kid is a big-time eater so stocking up when the store has a sale is important. This kit has a great variety while he starts trying new things, and doesn't have strawberry like a lot of the other packs do (family allergies mean I don't want to try it out with 2-3 packs if he can't have it). Highly recommend and will be buying again. Only complaint is that it's super duper packed, so open the Amazon box, then the outer box, the each of the packs, then the food you choose. A bit much, but I'll deal with it at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Girard

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product, too much apple
customer_reviews.text: I don’t necessarily like the combination of foods chosen for this combo pack. It’s definitely way too many apple products and not enough veggies.. 10 fruits, and 6 veggies. I like my baby to have a little of both with every meal so it doesn’t really even out. Also, there were several busted containers in the box when it arrived. I got a full refund, no questions asked. It is a great deal for the money, and if you do the subscribe and save you won’t get a better deal. I do prefer beech nut over this brand though.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product...other than the plastic container.
customer_reviews.text: I love Gerber baby foods for my Grandson. I grew up on these. My only wish is that they solely packaged their products in the small glass bottles. This plastic is terrible for our environment and I am HUGE on protecting our environment and global warming. Many people feel as I do. Gerber....you already have the BEST product out there so please take the environment into consideration and stop using plastic. Your sales will skyrocket.
customer_reviews.author: SherriD

customer_reviews.title: Food poisoned my 5 month old
customer_reviews.text: Package came hot and the labels a little worn. I was a little skeptical. My 5 month old tried 2 of these and projectile vomited each time. I can only assume the food was bad. The only reason I think this is because he did not do that with any of the store-bought food I purchased at a grocery store. Will never buy baby food off of the internet again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and Baby Loves!
customer_reviews.text: My 8-MO loves this variety pack! Great value for the portion size and great flavors.***I would make sure your LO has no allergies to the included fruits/veggies as we ended up having to give away all the squash-no biggie -but wish they had more of these combo packs that included more green beans or peas or flavors. I purchased the smaller Stage 1 starter veggie pak to incorporate more of the veggies our lil man will nosh- Overall a great buy and will buy again :D
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The preselected variety isn’t working how I’d hoped.
customer_reviews.text: Too many fruits compared to veggies and all the fruits are “stoppers” from the BRAT diet - except the pears. I will hand pick mine in the future.
customer_reviews.author: JP Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: Near expire date!
customer_reviews.text: The expiry date is so near that my baby can’t eat!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: ZHENG jiaying

customer_reviews.title: Good buy, packs weren't pretty
customer_reviews.text: I bought this right after we were told to self quarantine and this worked out perfectly for my baby. However, each individual thin cardboard packs looked like they went through something. Not clean and crisp packs like you see in the store, but after inspecting the food packs themselves were fine and baby enjoyed
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey C.

customer_reviews.title: Good baby food pack
customer_reviews.text: I like this combo of baby food, it's a good pack, it has more fruit than vegetables it's still a very good bargain, love it
customer_reviews.author: Anngie

customer_reviews.title: so so
customer_reviews.text: Some beans and pumpkins. My children do n’t like to eat sweet potatoes. Others are okay. I hope they can be more fruity. Those pumpkins taste really bad. I want to buy all of them with fruit flavors. But every box must have these beans, I hope to have a box full of fruits
customer_reviews.author: Miya C ai

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: We love this! It was packaged well when it arrived, nothing was broken, dented, or torn up and it didn't get too hot after staying on my porch all day in 100 degree weather. My daughter loves the flavors and being able to purchase the food like this has been so much more convenient and makes feedings easier!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't paying attention to how many I was buying! I got way more than I was expecting! Very happy with how much I got for the price. Perfect for filling reusable pouches. (yes I bought baby food to put into pouches instead of buying pouches or making my own.)
customer_reviews.author: tsp315

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!!!
customer_reviews.text: This food was great my grandson eat every kind in there and he loved them. Well the green beans we had to mix with an apples , but he still ate everything hahaha. Great value and great flavors!!!
customer_reviews.author: Keri

customer_reviews.title: A little liquidy, but comes with a lot and is good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Came with great quantity and my son loved the flavors. Some of the foods were just a little more liquidy than I like for 2nd foods. But overall good quantity for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what you'd expect. Arrives in one big box but considering how well they stack that isnt a problem. All the flavors are there. Overall it's a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: samantha

customer_reviews.title: Good for babys not for 18 year olds
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 10 month old nephew he loved it! However my 18 year old step brother (now 19 year old step brother) VEry much disliked the thickness, flavor, and texture of this healthy snack. I've since punished him for his transgressions and taken away his Nintendo.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I tired making my son home made purées but he just doesn’t like them. These are the only purées he will eat and I don’t blame him they taste delicious:) and worth the money Tbh. 10/10 no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Agnesa

customer_reviews.title: Not resealable!
customer_reviews.text: Great but didn’t realize these are not resealable. No plastic lid etc.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Connell

customer_reviews.title: Great Food - Difficult to Open
customer_reviews.text: Great food for my little one, the only thing that’s not five starts is the packaging. It’s quite difficult to open the packets.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Anne

customer_reviews.title: Saves a Trip Out
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to save myself a trip to the store. My subscription arrives on time, and my little enjoys his food very much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Good deal decent variety. I though it would be more random honestly.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Augustine Schmit

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value buy. I'd been comparing prices a d target had been the cheapest but the cups at target are smaller than these and these are cheaper! Love the variety.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: Needs more veggies
customer_reviews.text: This pack is just ok. Mostly apple and banana. Only 1 green beans. Wish there was more vegetables but overall ok
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Good buy and Gerber products are always a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly H

customer_reviews.title: not much cheaper buying in bulk than individual
customer_reviews.text: good product, just not much difference in price from buying each individual
customer_reviews.author: T-Rex Wes

customer_reviews.title: She loves Gerber
customer_reviews.text: Typical baby food. Love the option to buy it in bulk like this. My daughter loves Gerber baby food.
customer_reviews.author: BeLLaDiiVa

customer_reviews.title: Busted box and rotten food
customer_reviews.text: My box was busted when it arrived and 3 of the food items were rotten.
customer_reviews.author: Tannah

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Cheapest ones I have found. My baby really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: We have a subscription for this food and love it! However, last time it was delivered it had been mishandled while placed in the box to be shipped and one contained was punctured and leaked all over the rest, ruining the packaging. Very disappointed. This is the first issue we’ve ever had though!
customer_reviews.author: KayLyn

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves
customer_reviews.text: It’s all good. I just wish it can contain more veggies that are not sweet. But it’s a personal choice.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Buy
customer_reviews.text: Kid loves food. Bought 2 one set for the house one for daycare!
customer_reviews.author: bill

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I expected to receive the product exactly how it was pictured being that I ordered to send to someone. What I received each 2-pack inside a regular Amazon box. 🤷🏾‍♀️ I could've went to the grocery store and purchased it that way myself.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: baby food this was a great item and well wort the price
customer_reviews.author: bettye m mcmanus

customer_reviews.title: Good variety pack. Well worth it.
customer_reviews.text: High quality foods. Good recipes. The variety pack includes a good mixture of entrees, fruits, and vegetables. Good value for price.
customer_reviews.author: Tim G

customer_reviews.title: Convenient product
customer_reviews.text: Great variety in an easy to use and well packaged box
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Very good flavor
customer_reviews.text: Baby’s favorite flavor, this can mix so many different flavors of baby food, and my baby likes all of them as long as I put this in.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy.D

customer_reviews.title: So far Baby not accepting it
customer_reviews.text: My baby didn’t like the beans on the first try, not sure about the favor or thickness, will update later on the beans and other favors.
customer_reviews.author: Weiquan Huang

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I found this to be convenient, a good value, and a great variety. Our 8 month old loved every one of the foods in this variety pack.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Variety Ships as Seen
customer_reviews.text: Shipped as seen in photo. Very convenient and my daughter loves every flavor in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa M. Valdivieso

customer_reviews.title: So much Apple
customer_reviews.text: Really appreciate the veggies in this pack but all of the fruit includes apple which upsets my baby’s tummy. Too much apple, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Eames

customer_reviews.title: Great buy !!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and exactly what I thought I was buying
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Not in original packaging
customer_reviews.text: The product was not on the original packaging. We had received extra apple and extra banana and was shorted green beans and carrots
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Slawson

customer_reviews.title: Won’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: I give 2 stars because my LO loves the flavors but 6 of them were broken when they arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Babyfood
customer_reviews.text: Lasted longer than a month and had a great variety.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Killigrew

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Good variety of flavors. Easy to use and good for travel
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Warren

customer_reviews.title: When I opened the box of baby food a few containers were busted open
customer_reviews.text: I disliked that Some of my baby food containers were busted open
customer_reviews.author: Kellie etris

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Easy to order received fast! My son loved all flavors!
customer_reviews.author: Any Ramirez

product_meta.title: Gerber Purees 2nd Foods Veggie & Fruit Variety Pack, 8 Ounces, Box of 16 (packaging may vary)
product_meta.description: Flavor:Fruit & Veggie Variety Pack (16 Count)| *:Baby FoodThese fruits and veggies were grown using our Clean Field Farming practices - it’s how we ensure our purees are not only nutritious, but also wholesome and safe for every tiny tummy. Gerber 2nd Foods baby food recipes help expose babies to a variety of tastes and ingredient combinations, which is important to help them accept new flavors.
feature_bullets: Growing nutrition: Our 2nd Foods baby food recipes help expose babies to a variety of tastes & ingredients, which is important to help them accept new flavors. It's the perfect food for growing bodies

Fruit & veggie variety pack: Made with natural fruit & veggies & featuring age appropriate texture & nutrition, this variety pack contains no added sweeteners, salts or starches & no artificial flavors or colors.

Pureed goodness: Introduce your little one to the goodness of fruits, veggies & other wholesome ingredients. Our baby food is lovingly made & quality tested before it's good enough to be called Gerber.
Gerber goodness: Our foods start with whole ingredients like real fruits, veggies, & grains to help nourish your baby right from the start, from infant formula to baby food to snacks & toddler food.
Nutrition for growing: Like your baby, we're always growing & learning. More than ever we're committed to being your partner in parenthood with quality ingredients, nutritious food & expert guidance.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
